instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1708: What is A1708? A1708 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2017, 2016 with EMC 3164, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00840, 820-00875..
definitions.AP_RESET_L: What is AP_RESET_L? AP_RESET_L resets the wifi hardware when it is low, which will keep it from working. AP_RESET_L needs to be high for reset to not be asserted.  _L means whatever before the _L in the signal name is asserted when it is low voltage, such as 0.0v to 0.5v..

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> disable some modules
threads.message: Hi, I need to disable wifi and bluetooth on macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>, can you help, what element to desolder for that?

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> disable some modules
threads.message:
For WiFi, short <SIGNAL>AP_RESET_L</SIGNAL> to ground.
Check if system work without <CHIP>U3770</CHIP>, without Bluetooth.

<CHIP>U3780</CHIP> could be also removed and test if works stable without WiFi.
